tool_description: Tracks and analyzes hair growth patterns, length changes, and growth rate to assess hair health progress and identify growth issues.

current_length_inches.description: Current hair length measurement in inches

previous_length_inches.description: Previous hair length measurement in inches

hair_cuts_during_period.description: Whether hair was cut during measurement period

cut_length_inches.description: Length removed if hair was cut (inches)

hormonal_changes.description: Whether experiencing hormonal changes affecting hair

stress_level.description: Current stress level: low, moderate, high, or severe

medication_affecting_hair.description: Whether taking medications that may affect hair growth

scalp_treatments_used.description: Whether using scalp treatments to promote growth

error_messages: Invalid length measurements: Both current and previous lengths must be positive numbers
Invalid measurement interval: Must be between 7 and 365 days
Invalid age: Must be between 10 and 100 years
Invalid stress level: Must be one of [low, moderate, high, severe]
Measurement inconsistency: Current length cannot be greater than previous length plus expected growth unless treatments are used
Cut length required: If hair_cuts_during_period is true, cut_length_inches must be provided and greater than 0
usage: Provide current and previous length measurements, measurement interval, age, and whether hair was cut. Optionally specify cut length, hormonal changes, supplements, stress level, medications, and scalp treatments. Returns growth analysis with rate calculations.

growth_rate_inches_month.description: Calculated monthly growth rate in inches

growth_assessment.description: Growth rate evaluation: excellent, good, average, slow, or concerning
